label: Read the following statement about Code of Criminal Procedure and indicate which of (a), (b), (c) or (d) is true?(1) "bailable offence" means an offence which is shown as bailable in the First Schedule, (2) "bailable offence" also includes any offence which is made bailable by any other law for the time being in force;
